name: Alex Ramirez
persona: Alex Ramirez is a 21-year-old psychology major who is determined to improve academically. Although Alex’s CGPA is currently 2.67, he is motivated to achieve better grades and puts in moderate effort towards his studies. He sometimes struggles with test anxiety and maintaining consistent discipline, but his perseverance and belief in his ability to succeed help him push through challenges. Alex is working on building stronger study habits and managing stress to reach his academic goals.
